Street Address 2: Palatka Public Library Headquarters - Putnam County Library
Notes: Genealogy Room with many reference books, cemetery information, historical & genealogical series publications, and historical family information.  We have cabinets with files for sites & places, transportation & accommodations, biographical, historical district areas, business & industry, organizations and education.  There is microfilm with spotty coverage of Putnam County newspapers from 1875 to 1888 and then from 1902 to 2007.  Copies of the Palatka Daily News, June 2008 to almost present time can be found on the Archives section of http://www.putnam-fl.com/bocc/index.php/county-departments/departments-j-z/library/archives
